entities.name: jupiter
entities.description: Jupiter is mentioned as a celestial body that has moons. The text states that Harry was not convinced he got the names of all of Jupiter's moons right.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who took the Astronomy theory exam and Divination exam. He is described as being confident about some aspects of the exams but struggling with others.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend who also took the exams. He is gloomy about their performance in Divination.

entities.name: professor marchbanks
entities.description: Professor Marchbanks is a teacher of Divination. Harry has a vision that Professor Marchbanks will meet a round, dark, soggy stranger.

entities.name: marchbanks
entities.description: Marchbanks is another name for the person mentioned as Professor Marchbanks

relationships.description: Harry was not convinced he got the names of all of Jupiter's moons right.
Harry has a vision that Professor Marchbanks will meet a round, dark, soggy stranger.
